channel.title: Programming on credibleDEV
channel.description: Recent content in Programming on credibleDEV

item.title: Install JetBrains Rider for C# on Linux
item.description: JetBrains Rider is an excellent IDE to get started coding C# .NET Applications for all Linux distributions.

item.title: Linux C# .NET GUI App Using Avalonia UI
item.description: Quickly get up and running building your first Linux GUI app using C#, .NET, Avalonia UI and Rider.

item.title: Part 4 - Beginner's Guide to Bash Scripting
item.description: This guide is part of a series, be sure to check out the other parts as well. Part 1 - Introduction to Bash, Variables, Comments, User Input Part 2 - If/Else Statements, Looping Part 3 - Functions in Bash Part 4 - Creating Menus in Bash (This Page) In this part, we will be covering how to create menus in Bash scripting on Linux. We will first cover a basic menu that is really simple to set up and use but also flexible and works for most cases.

item.title: Part 3 â€“ Beginners Guide to Bash Scripting
item.description: In Part 3 we discover how functions work in bash scripting, which is quite different when compared to other languages such as Javascript or Python.

item.title: Install GCC on Ubuntu Linux
item.description: Installing GCC on Ubuntu is an essential task if you plan to compile C or C++ programs. It can be installed using the build&#x2d;essential package or by itself.

item.title: Part 2 - Beginners Guide to Bash Scripting
item.description: Conditional statements and looping are important in bash scripting. This guide has example bash scripts to show the proper use of if, while, until and for loops.

item.title: Beginners Guide to Bash Scripting
item.description: In Part 1, this guide teaches readers the basics of bash scripting including variables, getting user input and doing basic math in bash.

item.title: The Next Y2K: Year 2038 Problem
item.description: The new Y2K is the year 2038 problem, also known as the Y2K38 bug. The Unix Timestamp is to blame but there is a simple fix which is already in the works.

item.title: Easily Install dotNet In Linux - 2023 Guide
item.description: Get started developing for dotnet in Linux with this simple Guide. Setup dotnet in VSCode for Linux and write your first C# app.

item.title: Install Java for VS Code on Manjaro Linux
item.description: This guide walks you through how to install Java for VS code on Manjaro Linux using the pacman package manager.

item.title: Install VSCode on Manjaro Linux
item.description: This guide walks you through how to quickly install VS code on Manjaro Linux using the Snap package manager.

item.title: Install NodeJS on Manjaro Linux - 2023 Update
item.description: How to install NodeJS on Manjaro Linux. This guide walks you through the steps to install NodeJS to get your next code project started.
